title: Exploring Rust HashSet Operations
description: In this lab, we explore the functionalities of the HashSet data structure in Rust, which guarantees unique elements and can perform operations such as union, difference, intersection, and symmetric difference on sets.

meta.title: Rust HashSet: Unique Data Structure | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Explore the powerful HashSet data structure in Rust, learn its unique features, and discover set operations like union, difference, intersection, and symmetric difference.
meta.keywords: Rust, HashSet, Data Structure, Set Operations, Programming Tutorials
